title: Add dedicated PWA install/download page at /install route

requirements.summary: Add /install route to TanStack Router that renders the existing InstallPage component
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /install in the browser renders the InstallPage component without errors.
The /install route is nested under the root layout so TopBar and BottomNav are visible.
The route is accessible from any browser without authentication if appropriate, or within the AuthGate flow consistent with other routes.

file_operations.description: Add a new /install route to the TanStack Router configuration that renders the InstallPage component from frontend/src/pages/InstallPage.tsx. Nest it under the root layout (wrapped in AuthGate) to ensure TopBar and BottomNav are visible, consistent with other app routes.

requirements.summary: Add visible navigation entry point to the /install page within the app UI
acceptanceCriteria: There is at least one in-app navigation element (link, button, or menu item) that routes the user to /install.
The entry point is labeled clearly, e.g. 'Install App' or 'Download App'.
Clicking the entry point navigates to /install without a full page reload.

file_operations.description: Add an 'Install App' icon button to the TopBar navigation that routes to /install using a TanStack Router Link. Position it logically among existing navigation icons, ensuring clear visual affordance for users to discover the install page.
